short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight Backlog tool for Chatwork

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight Backlog tool in your Browser

The extension injects Nulab's Backlog tool into Chatwork, to help you manage all of issues inside chat room.

When use the extension, you can:
- Specific a project for a chat room
- List all of issues in Backlog tool
- Search issue
- Add a new issue
- Modify issue status and assignee

To start with this extension:
- Download this extension
- Log into Chatwork
- Configure your Backlog Host and Backlog API Key
- Set project key for chat room
